DataElement.preferredDefinition: Terminology to describe the reason for the disruption of systemic therapy due to COVID-19.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Intervention or Procedure SARS Coronavirus 2 Disruption
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak._An interruption or interference in continuity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Property.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure SARS Coronavirus 2 Disruption
Property.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.:An interruption or interference in continuity.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.
An interruption or interference in continuity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak._An interruption or interference in continuity._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm.

Concepts.definition: A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Disruption to Therapy Because of Non-COVID-19-Related Comorbidity

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Disruption to Therapy Because of Non-COVID-19-Related Comorbidity
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that there was a disruption in a patient's therapy because of non-COVID-19-related comorbidity.

Concepts.longName: Disruption to Therapy Because of Non-COVID-19-Related Comorbidity
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that there was a disruption in a patient's therapy because of non-COVID-19-related comorbidity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects associated with the action or administration of therapeutic agents.

Concepts.definition: The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects associated with the action or administration of therapeutic agents.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A directive to indicate a response not listed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Systemic Therapy SARS Coronavirus 2 Disruption Reason
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.:A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.:An interruption or interference in continuity.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.
A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.
An interruption or interference in continuity.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
